name: Beemaster
tag_list: vdi, thin-computing, application-delivery, server-based-computing, soa, esb, j2ee, middleware, cloud
overview:
We deliver solutions for SaaS, thin computing and the Virtual Desktops and Application Delivery market.

With our BeeBox Application Server technology you are able to publish any application from anyware onto any access device.

Our technology enables you to quickly install and deploy virtual desktops and Application Servers. This can be done from the internet, locally or in mixed ICT environments.

By leveraging Open Source and commercial development, we offer open and platform independent solutions at a lower cost than existing solutions and for organizations of all sizes.

Go to http://www.beemasterict.com/Download.html for product demo’s and downloads.
